main.description: and i love create web apps.

about.description:
As a full stack developer, I have more than 5 years of experience in creating web applications, using technologies such as Typescrypt, Nodejs, Golang, React, Vue and Nextjs. My commitment to teamwork is reflected in a proactive attitude and always willing to give the best of myself, always open to change. I focus on the creation of quality code.

I am a technology enthusiast, aware that in this dynamic field there are always exciting opportunities to learn something new.
about.label: The best things are written in the web.

education.description: Discover how my education and successes have been instrumental in driving my passion for creating comprehensive, cutting-edge technology solutions.
education.label: Awards & education
education.hackathonDescription: The hackathon was created by the Autonomous University of Manizales - CO, in collaboration with IAS software.

experience.label: Experience
experience.description: Immerse yourself in my career as a web developer. My background includes the creation of comprehensive and efficient solutions that fuse the creativity of design with the robustness of programming. Discover how each project is a testament to my commitment to software quality and innovation
experience.ultraDescription: Custom software development using technologies such as React, Vue, Node.js, and TypeScript. I led the creation of an online course application powered by artificial intelligence, refactored existing code by applying best practices, redesigned the user interface based on a predefined design, and developed new features from scratch.
experience.zenviaDescription: Full Stack web development using technologies such as React, Node.js, JavaScript and TypeScript. I focused on the near real-time processing, webhooks, rebranding and integrations with external apps. In addition, I am currently responsible for detecting and fixing bugs, as well as creating new features from scratch.
experience.andikemDescription: I led the frontend development of a platform to manage containers globally. I used ReactJs, Bootstrap and Google Maps to create a modern and functional interface. Initially, I focused on redesigning the application, establishing a modular structure and development conventions. Then, I built each part of the application, implementing its respective functionalities. My work resulted in an efficient and easy to use platform.
experience.licimaticDescription: Full Stack web development using technologies such as React, Pub/Sub, Node.js, JavaScript and Golang. I focused on refactoring the spaghetti code of several apps and creating new backend/frontend functionalities such as endpoint creation, Cron jobs and scrapping with near real time strategies and UI building. Finally I was focused on the complete UI redesign of the app.
experience.swatitDescription: Web development using technologies such as PHP, Angular, Wordpress, Jquery, TypeRocket. I focused on creating new functionalities such as UI creation and corrections, endpoint creation and recovery of almost lost projects.
experience.redCapDescription: Custom software development using technologies such as React, Next.js, NestJS, and TypeScript. Integration of external services for casino bonus creation.

portfolio.label: portfolio
portfolio.description: Step into my digital world where versatility meets innovation. Each project in my portfolio is the result of merging frontend and backend, from captivating interfaces to robust systems. Discover how I transform ideas into complete solutions with an inspiring and functional touch.
portfolio.wordSearchDescription: Dive into the challenge of word searches: compete in real-time, invite your friends, and challenge the AI to create your own words.
portfolio.3designDescription: Explore a world of creativity with 3D printing. Print your own ideas, find a wide variety of printed items, and access spare parts for your 3D printers in the store.
portfolio.dummyDescription: Created with Dummy API and social authentication. Share unique moments through images, explore tags, and enjoy an immersive visual interaction experience with your friends.
portfolio.spotyDescription: Explore the evolution of music with our redesigned app, taking the Spotify experience to new levels. Discover an inspiring UI.
portfolio.quizzifyDescription: Challenge your mind with fun and educational questions across a wide range of topics. Compete with friends, track your progress, and become an expert while having a blast.

Together we can build impactful solutions that transcend expectations!
